::Dark Rodimus::
   
  Now that the probe attached to his neck was "going critical" Rodimus noticed it.
   
  Rodimus: What is this?! What is on me? Perceptor, can you get this off?

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
          ----- Original Message ---- 
From: Richard Allen <roborick007@...> 

> Dark Rodimus is activated and becomes councious. The first thing he does is swat the spider-spy 
> off of his neck. He doesn't realize what it was. Rodimus exits the room to find Jhiaxus, Hydras and 
> Perceptor. 
>
> Dark Rodimus: What is the situation? Who needs to die? 

Dark Rodimus attempts to swat off the spider spy, but is unable to dislodge it with such a simple move. it appears to have attached itself to him - like a tick! It has already transmitted its information, and so it has one final command! 

Connected as it is to Dark Rodimus' neck, and through its probe to his spinal nexus; it began to glow and flash in a rythmic patturn, a slow beat that is accelerating .. a count down to something ominious!

Preston
(Da'minion)
